MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA1 postcode area of Woolston, Warrington affecting properties in Dam Lane, Hillock Lane, Poulton Crescent and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because our engineers are investigating a suspected underground cable fault  and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:38AM on 23rd October 2020
